title: Ulalushka
text:
Ulalushka () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">settlement</a>) in <a href="Mayminsky%20District">Mayminsky District</a>, the <a href="Altai%20Republic">Altai Republic</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. The population was 9 as of 2016.
Geography.
Ulalushka is located 20 km southeast of <a href="Mayma">Mayma</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Alfyorovo is the nearest rural locality.
